STIG Manager API Definition¶

STIG Manager implements the OpenAPI 3.0.1 Definition shown here. Check the repository for more details: STIG Manager OSS OpenAPI definition .

GET /assets¶

Return a list of Assets accessible to the requester

Query Parameters

  • collectionId (string) – Selects Assets mapped to a Collection (Required)

  • name (string) – Matches against the name according to the name-match parameter

  • name-match (string) – How to match against the name parameter

  • metadata (array) – A query parameter that specifies metadata key:value pairs to select matching Objects

  • benchmarkId (string) – Selects Assets mapped to a STIG

  • elevate (boolean) – Elevate the user context for this request if user is permitted (canAdmin)

  • projection (array) – Additional properties to include in the response.

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – AssetProjected array response

  • default – unexpected error

POST /assets¶

Create an Asset

Query Parameters

  • elevate (boolean) – Elevate the user context for this request if user is permitted (canAdmin)

  • projection (array) – Additional properties to include in the response.

Status Codes

  • 201 Created – AssetProjected response

  • 400 Bad Request – Client Error

  • default – unexpected error

GET /assets/{assetId}¶

Return an Asset

Parameters

  • assetId (string) – A path parameter that identifies an Asset

Query Parameters

  • elevate (boolean) – Elevate the user context for this request if user is permitted (canAdmin)

  • projection (array) – Additional properties to include in the response.

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – AssetProjected response

  • default – unexpected error

PATCH /assets/{assetId}¶

Merge provided properties with an Asset

Parameters

  • assetId (string) – A path parameter that identifies an Asset

Query Parameters

  • elevate (boolean) – Elevate the user context for this request if user is permitted (canAdmin)

  • projection (array) – Additional properties to include in the response.

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – AssetProjected response

  • default – unexpected error

PUT /assets/{assetId}¶

Set all properties of an Asset

Parameters

  • assetId (string) – A path parameter that identifies an Asset

Query Parameters

  • elevate (boolean) – Elevate the user context for this request if user is permitted (canAdmin)

  • projection (array) – Additional properties to include in the response.

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – AssetProjected response

  • default – unexpected error

DELETE /assets/{assetId}¶

Delete an Asset

Parameters

  • assetId (string) – A path parameter that identifies an Asset

Query Parameters

  • elevate (boolean) – Elevate the user context for this request if user is permitted (canAdmin)

  • projection (array) – Additional properties to include in the response.

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – AssetProjected response

  • default – unexpected error

GET /assets/{assetId}/checklists¶

Return a multi-STIG CKL for an Asset and its mapped STIGs

Parameters

  • assetId (string) – A path parameter that identifies an Asset

Query Parameters

  • benchmarkId (array) – Identifies a STIG. Default is all mapped STIGs.

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – Review response

  • default – unexpected error

GET /assets/{assetId}/checklists/{benchmarkId}/{revisionStr}¶

Return JSON or a CKL file for an Asset and STIG

Parameters

  • assetId (string) – A path parameter that identifies an Asset

  • benchmarkId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a STIG

  • revisionStr (string) – A path parameter that identifies a STIG revision [ V{version_num}R{release_num} | ‘latest’ ]

Query Parameters

  • format (string) – The format of the response. Default if missing is ‘json’

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – Review response

  • default – unexpected error

GET /assets/{assetId}/metadata¶

Return the metadata for Asset

Parameters

  • assetId (string) – A path parameter that identifies an Asset

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – Metadata response

  • default – unexpected error

PATCH /assets/{assetId}/metadata¶

Merge the provided object to a Assetmetadata

Parameters

  • assetId (string) – A path parameter that identifies an Asset

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – Metadata response

  • default – unexpected error

PUT /assets/{assetId}/metadata¶

Set a Asset metadata to the provided object

Parameters

  • assetId (string) – A path parameter that identifies an Asset

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – Metadata response

  • default – unexpected error

GET /assets/{assetId}/metadata/keys¶

Return the keys of the provided Asset’s metadata

Parameters

  • assetId (string) – A path parameter that identifies an Asset

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – MetadataKeys response

  • default – unexpected error

GET /assets/{assetId}/metadata/keys/{key}¶

Return the value of the provided Asset metadata key

Parameters

  • assetId (string) – A path parameter that identifies an Asset

  • key (string) – A path parameter that specifies a metadata key

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – MetadataValue response

  • default – unexpected error

PUT /assets/{assetId}/metadata/keys/{key}¶

Set the value of the provided Asset metadata key to the provided string

Parameters

  • assetId (string) – A path parameter that identifies an Asset

  • key (string) – A path parameter that specifies a metadata key

Status Codes

  • 204 No Content – Empty to avoid large response after putting key with large value

  • default – unexpected error

DELETE /assets/{assetId}/metadata/keys/{key}¶

Remove the provided Asset metadata key

Parameters

  • assetId (string) – A path parameter that identifies an Asset

  • key (string) – A path parameter that specifies a metadata key

Status Codes

  • 204 No Content – Empty to avoid large response after deleteing key with large value

  • default – unexpected error

GET /assets/{assetId}/stigs¶

Return an Asset’s STIG assignments

Parameters

  • assetId (string) – A path parameter that identifies an Asset

Query Parameters

  • elevate (boolean) – Elevate the user context for this request if user is permitted (canAdmin)

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – STIG array response

  • default – unexpected error

DELETE /assets/{assetId}/stigs¶

Delete all STIG assignments to an Asset

Parameters

  • assetId (string) – A path parameter that identifies an Asset

Query Parameters

  • elevate (boolean) – Elevate the user context for this request if user is permitted (canAdmin)

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – STIG array response

  • default – unexpected error

PUT /assets/{assetId}/stigs/{benchmarkId}¶

Assign a STIG to an Asset

Parameters

  • assetId (string) – A path parameter that identifies an Asset

  • benchmarkId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a STIG

Query Parameters

  • elevate (boolean) – Elevate the user context for this request if user is permitted (canAdmin)

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – STIG array response

  • default – unexpected error

DELETE /assets/{assetId}/stigs/{benchmarkId}¶

Delete a STIG assignment to an Asset

Parameters

  • assetId (string) – A path parameter that identifies an Asset

  • benchmarkId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a STIG

Query Parameters

  • elevate (boolean) – Elevate the user context for this request if user is permitted (canAdmin)

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – STIG array response

  • default – unexpected error

GET /collections¶

Return a list of Collections accessible to the requester

Query Parameters

  • name (string) – Matches against the name according to the name-match parameter

  • name-match (string) – How to match against the name parameter

  • workflow (string) – Match Collections having a specific workflow.

  • metadata (array) – A query parameter that specifies metadata key:value pairs to select matching Objects

  • projection (array) – Additional properties to include in the response.

  • elevate (boolean) – Elevate the user context for this request if user is permitted (canAdmin)

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – CollectionsProjected response

  • default – unexpected error

POST /collections¶

Create a Collection

Query Parameters

  • projection (array) – Additional properties to include in the response.

  • elevate (boolean) – Elevate the user context for this request if user is permitted (canAdmin)

Status Codes

  • 201 Created – CollectionProjected response

  • 400 Bad Request – Client Error

  • default – unexpected error

GET /collections/{collectionId}¶

Return a Collection

Parameters

  • collectionId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a Collection

Query Parameters

  • elevate (boolean) – Elevate the user context for this request if user is permitted (canAdmin)

  • projection (array) – Additional properties to include in the response.

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – CollectionProjected response

  • 204 No Content – No Content

  • default – unexpected error

PATCH /collections/{collectionId}¶

Merge provided properties with a Collection

Parameters

  • collectionId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a Collection

Query Parameters

  • elevate (boolean) – Elevate the user context for this request if user is permitted (canAdmin)

  • projection (array) – Additional properties to include in the response.

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – CollectionProjected response

  • default – unexpected error

Set all properties of a Collection

Parameters

Query Parameters

  • projection (array) – Additional properties to include in the response.

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – CollectionProjected response

  • default – unexpected error

DELETE /collections/{collectionId}¶

Delete a Collection

Parameters

  • collectionId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a Collection

Query Parameters

  • elevate (boolean) – Elevate the user context for this request if user is permitted (canAdmin)

  • projection (array) – Additional properties to include in the response.

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – CollectionProjected response

  • default – unexpected error

GET /collections/{collectionId}/checklists/{benchmarkId}/{revisionStr}¶

Return the Checklist for the supplied Collection and STIG

Parameters

  • collectionId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a Collection

  • benchmarkId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a STIG

  • revisionStr (string) – A path parameter that identifies a STIG revision [ V{version_num}R{release_num} | ‘latest’ ]

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – ChecklistCollectionStig response

  • default – unexpected error

GET /collections/{collectionId}/findings¶

Return the Findings for the specified Collection

Parameters

  • collectionId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a Collection

Query Parameters

  • aggregator (string) – Aggregate the findings on this property (Required)

  • acceptedOnly (boolean) –

  • benchmarkId (string) – A query parameter that identifies a STIG

  • assetId (string) – A query parameter that identifies an Asset

  • projection (array) – Optional properties to return

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – CollectionFinding response

  • default – unexpected error

GET /collections/{collectionId}/grants/{userId}/access¶

Return an accessLevel = 1 User’s access to the specified Collection. Request must be made by a User with accessLevel >= 3 to the Collection.

Parameters

  • collectionId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a Collection

  • userId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a User

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – Collection STIGAssetProjected array response

  • 403 Forbidden – The requesting User does not have access rights to the content

  • default – unexpected error

PUT /collections/{collectionId}/grants/{userId}/access¶

Set an accessLevel = 1 User’s access to the specified Collection. Request must be made by a User with accessLevel >= 3 to the Collection.

Parameters

  • collectionId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a Collection

  • userId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a User

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – StigAssetProjected array response

  • default – unexpected error

GET /collections/{collectionId}/poam¶

Return a POAM-like spreadsheet for the specified Collection aggregated by groupId

Parameters

  • collectionId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a Collection

Query Parameters

  • aggregator (string) – Aggregate the findings on this property (Required)

  • acceptedOnly (boolean) –

  • benchmarkId (string) – A query parameter that identifies a STIG

  • assetId (string) – A query parameter that identifies an Asset

  • date (string) – Value for columns Scheduled Completion Date, Milestone With Completion Dates, Milestone Changes

  • office (string) – Value for column Office/Org

  • status (string) – Value for column Status

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – CollectionFinding response

  • default – unexpected error

GET /collections/{collectionId}/reviews¶

Return a list of Reviews accessible to the requester

Parameters

  • collectionId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a Collection

Query Parameters

  • rules (string) –

  • result (string) –

  • status (string) –

  • ruleId (string) – Selects Reviews of a Rule

  • groupId (string) – A query parameter that identifies a Group

  • cci (string) – A query parameter that identifies a CCI

  • userId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a User

  • assetId (string) – A query parameter that identifies an Asset

  • benchmarkId (string) – A query parameter that identifies a STIG

  • metadata (array) – A query parameter that specifies metadata key:value pairs to select matching Objects

  • projection (array) – Additional properties to include in the response.

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – Review response

  • default – unexpected error

GET /collections/{collectionId}/reviews/{assetId}¶

Return a list of Reviews for an Asset

Parameters

  • collectionId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a Collection

  • assetId (string) – A path parameter that identifies an Asset

Query Parameters

  • rules (string) –

  • result (string) –

  • status (string) –

  • benchmarkId (string) – A query parameter that identifies a STIG

  • metadata (array) – A query parameter that specifies metadata key:value pairs to select matching Objects

  • projection (array) – Additional properties to include in the response.

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – ReviewAssetProjected response

  • default – unexpected error

POST /collections/{collectionId}/reviews/{assetId}¶

Post one or more Reviews

Parameters

  • collectionId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a Collection

  • assetId (string) – A path parameter that identifies an Asset

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – ReviewPostResponse response

  • default – unexpected error

GET /collections/{collectionId}/reviews/{assetId}/{ruleId}¶

Return the Review for an Asset and Rule

Parameters

  • collectionId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a Collection

  • assetId (string) – A path parameter that identifies an Asset

  • ruleId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a Rule

Query Parameters

  • projection (array) – Additional properties to include in the response.

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – ReviewAssetRuleRead response

  • default – unexpected error

PATCH /collections/{collectionId}/reviews/{assetId}/{ruleId}¶

Merge provided properties with a Review

Update the given properties of a Review, if it exists

Parameters

  • collectionId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a Collection

  • assetId (string) – A path parameter that identifies an Asset

  • ruleId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a Rule

Query Parameters

  • projection (array) – Additional properties to include in the response.

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – ReviewProjected response

  • default – unexpected error

PUT /collections/{collectionId}/reviews/{assetId}/{ruleId}¶

Set all properties of a Review

Create a new Review, or update all properties of an existing Review, setting missing properties to null

Parameters

  • collectionId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a Collection

  • assetId (string) – A path parameter that identifies an Asset

  • ruleId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a Rule

Query Parameters

  • projection (array) – Additional properties to include in the response.

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – ReviewProjected response

  • default – unexpected error

DELETE /collections/{collectionId}/reviews/{assetId}/{ruleId}¶

Delete a Review

Parameters

  • collectionId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a Collection

  • assetId (string) – A path parameter that identifies an Asset

  • ruleId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a Rule

Query Parameters

  • elevate (boolean) – Elevate the user context for this request if user is permitted (canAdmin)

  • projection (array) – Additional properties to include in the response.

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – ReviewProjected response

  • default – unexpected error

GET /collections/{collectionId}/reviews/{assetId}/{ruleId}/metadata¶

Return the metadata for Review

Parameters

  • collectionId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a Collection

  • assetId (string) – A path parameter that identifies an Asset

  • ruleId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a Rule

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – Metadata response

  • default – unexpected error

PATCH /collections/{collectionId}/reviews/{assetId}/{ruleId}/metadata¶

Merge the provided object to a Review metadata

Parameters

  • collectionId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a Collection

  • assetId (string) – A path parameter that identifies an Asset

  • ruleId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a Rule

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – Metadata response

  • default – unexpected error

PUT /collections/{collectionId}/reviews/{assetId}/{ruleId}/metadata¶

Set a Review metadata to the provided object

Parameters

  • collectionId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a Collection

  • assetId (string) – A path parameter that identifies an Asset

  • ruleId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a Rule

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – Metadata response

  • default – unexpected error

GET /collections/{collectionId}/reviews/{assetId}/{ruleId}/metadata/keys¶

Return the keys of the provided Review’s metadata

Parameters

  • collectionId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a Collection

  • assetId (string) – A path parameter that identifies an Asset

  • ruleId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a Rule

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – MetadataKeys response

  • default – unexpected error

GET /collections/{collectionId}/reviews/{assetId}/{ruleId}/metadata/keys/{key}¶

Return the value of the provided Review metadata key

Parameters

  • collectionId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a Collection

  • assetId (string) – A path parameter that identifies an Asset

  • ruleId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a Rule

  • key (string) – A path parameter that specifies a metadata key

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – MetadataValue response

  • default – unexpected error

PUT /collections/{collectionId}/reviews/{assetId}/{ruleId}/metadata/keys/{key}¶

Set the value of the provided Review metadata key to the provided string

Parameters

  • collectionId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a Collection

  • assetId (string) – A path parameter that identifies an Asset

  • ruleId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a Rule

  • key (string) – A path parameter that specifies a metadata key

Status Codes

  • 204 No Content – Empty to avoid large response after putting key with large value

  • default – unexpected error

DELETE /collections/{collectionId}/reviews/{assetId}/{ruleId}/metadata/keys/{key}¶

Remove the provided Review metadata key

Parameters

  • collectionId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a Collection

  • assetId (string) – A path parameter that identifies an Asset

  • ruleId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a Rule

  • key (string) – A path parameter that specifies a metadata key

Status Codes

  • 204 No Content – Empty to avoid large response after deleteing key with large value

  • default – unexpected error

  • key (string) – A path parameter that specifies a metadata key

Status Codes

  • 204 No Content – Empty to avoid large response after deleteing key with large value

  • default – unexpected error

GET /collections/{collectionId}/review-history¶

Return history records for the specified Collection that meet the specified criteria

Parameters

  • collectionId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a Collection

Query Parameters

  • startDate (string) – History entries with a timestamp before the specified start date.

  • endDate (string) – History entries with a timestamp after the specified end date.

  • assetId (string) – A query parameter that identifies an Asset

  • ruleId (string) – Selects Reviews of a Rule

  • status (string) –

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – ReviewHistory response

  • default – unexpected error

DELETE /collections/{collectionId}/review-history¶

Remove history records that meet specified criteria

Parameters

  • collectionId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a Collection

Query Parameters

  • retentionDate (string) – Delete history entries with a timestamp earlier than the specified retention date. (Required)

  • assetId (string) – A query parameter that identifies an Asset

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – Number of history records deleted.

  • default – unexpected error

GET /collections/{collectionId}/review-history/stats¶

Return history statistics for the specified Collection

Parameters

  • collectionId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a Collection

Query Parameters

  • startDate (string) – History entries with a timestamp before the specified start date.

  • endDate (string) – History entries with a timestamp after the specified end date.

  • assetId (string) – A query parameter that identifies an Asset

  • ruleId (string) – Selects Reviews of a Rule

  • status (string) –

  • projection (array) – Return review history statistics with the specified level of granularity.

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – ReviewHistoryStats response

  • default – unexpected error

GET /collections/{collectionId}/status¶

Return the status statistics for the specified Collection

Parameters

  • collectionId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a Collection

Query Parameters

  • benchmarkId (array) – A query parameter that identifies a STIG

  • assetId (array) – A query parameter that identifies an Asset

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – CollectionStatus response

  • default – unexpected error

GET /collections/{collectionId}/stigs¶

Return the STIGs mapped in the specified Collection

Parameters

  • collectionId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a Collection

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – Collection STIGs array response

  • default – unexpected error

GET /collections/{collectionId}/stigs/{benchmarkId}/assets¶

Get the Assets in a Collection attached to a STIG

Parameters

  • collectionId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a Collection

  • benchmarkId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a STIG

Query Parameters

  • elevate (boolean) – Elevate the user context for this request if user is permitted (canAdmin)

  • projection (array) – Additional properties to include in the response.

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – AssetBasicProjected response

  • default – unexpected error

PUT /collections/{collectionId}/stigs/{benchmarkId}/assets¶

Set the Assets mapped to a STIG

Parameters

  • collectionId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a Collection

  • benchmarkId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a STIG

Query Parameters

  • elevate (boolean) – Elevate the user context for this request if user is permitted (canAdmin)

  • projection (array) – Additional properties to include in the response.

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – AssetBasicProjected response

  • default – unexpected error

GET /op/appdata¶

Export application data

Query Parameters

  • elevate (boolean) – Elevate the user context for this request if user is permitted (canAdmin)

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – Exported data

  • default – unexpected error

POST /op/appdata¶

Import and overwrite application data

Query Parameters

  • elevate (boolean) – Elevate the user context for this request if user is permitted (canAdmin)

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – Import successful

  • default – unexpected error

GET /op/configuration¶

Return API version and configuration information

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – Configuration response

GET /op/cors-proxy/oidc/.well-known/openid-configuration¶

Proxy a request to the OIDC provider’s openid-configuration endpoint

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – Configuration response

POST /op/cors-proxy/oidc/token¶

Proxy a request to the OIDC provider’s token_endpoint

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – Token response

GET /op/definition¶

Return the API definition

Query Parameters

  • jsonpath (string) – A JSONPath expression

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – Definition response

GET /stigs¶

Return a list of available STIGs

Query Parameters

  • title (string) – A string found anywhere in a STIG title

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – STIG response

  • default – unexpected error

POST /stigs¶

Import a STIG or SCAP Benchmark

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – The added STIG

  • default – unexpected error

GET /stigs/ccis/{cci}¶

Return data for the specified CCI

Parameters

  • cci (string) – A path parameter that identifies a CCI

Query Parameters

  • projection (array) – Additional properties to include in the response.

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – CCI response

  • default – unexpected error

GET /stigs/rules/{ruleId}¶

Return the defintion and associated checks and fixes for the specified Rule

Parameters

  • ruleId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a Rule

Query Parameters

  • projection (array) – Additional properties to include in the response.

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – Rule response

  • default – unexpected error

GET /stigs/scap-maps¶

Return a list of SCAP benchmarkIds mapped to Manual benchmarkIds

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – SCAP Map response

  • default – unexpected error

GET /stigs/{benchmarkId}¶

Return properties of the specified STIG

Parameters

  • benchmarkId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a STIG

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – STIG response

  • default – unexpected error

DELETE /stigs/{benchmarkId}¶

Deletes a STIG (* and all revisions *)

Parameters

  • benchmarkId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a STIG

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – The deleted STIG

  • default – unexpected error

GET /stigs/{benchmarkId}/revisions¶

Return a list of revisions for the specified STIG

Parameters

  • benchmarkId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a STIG

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – Revision response

  • default – unexpected error

GET /stigs/{benchmarkId}/revisions/{revisionStr}¶

Return metadata for the specified revision of a STIG

Parameters

  • benchmarkId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a STIG

  • revisionStr (string) – A path parameter that identifies a STIG revision [ V{version_num}R{release_num} | ‘latest’ ]

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – Revision response

  • default – unexpected error

DELETE /stigs/{benchmarkId}/revisions/{revisionStr}¶

Deletes the specified revision of a STIG

Parameters

  • benchmarkId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a STIG

  • revisionStr (string) – A path parameter that identifies a STIG revision [ V{version_num}R{release_num} ]

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – The deleted Revision

  • default – unexpected error

GET /stigs/{benchmarkId}/revisions/{revisionStr}/ccis¶

Return a list of CCIs from a STIG revision

Parameters

  • benchmarkId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a STIG

  • revisionStr (string) – A path parameter that identifies a STIG revision [ V{version_num}R{release_num} | ‘latest’ ]

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – CCI response

  • default – unexpected error

GET /stigs/{benchmarkId}/revisions/{revisionStr}/groups¶

Return the list of groups for the specified revision of a STIG.

Parameters

  • benchmarkId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a STIG

  • revisionStr (string) – A path parameter that identifies a STIG revision [ V{version_num}R{release_num} | ‘latest’ ]

Query Parameters

  • projection (array) – Additional properties to include in the response.

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – GroupProjected response

  • default – unexpected error

GET /stigs/{benchmarkId}/revisions/{revisionStr}/groups/{groupId}¶

Return the rules, checks and fixes for a Group from a specified revision of a STIG.

None

Parameters

  • benchmarkId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a STIG

  • revisionStr (string) – A path parameter that identifies a STIG revision [ V{version_num}R{release_num} | ‘latest’ ]

  • groupId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a Group

Query Parameters

  • projection (array) – Additional properties to include in the response.

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – Group response

  • default – unexpected error

  • revisionStr (string) – A path parameter that identifies a STIG revision [ V{version_num}R{release_num} | ‘latest’ ]

Query Parameters

  • projection (array) – Additional properties to include in the response.

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – Rule response

  • default – unexpected error

GET /stigs/{benchmarkId}/revisions/{revisionStr}/rules/{ruleId}¶

Return rule data for the specified Rule in a revision of a STIG.

Parameters

  • benchmarkId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a STIG

  • revisionStr (string) – A path parameter that identifies a STIG revision [ V{version_num}R{release_num} | ‘latest’ ]

  • ruleId (string) – A path parameter that identifies a Rule

Query Parameters

  • projection (array) – Additional properties to include in the response.

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – RuleProjected response

  • default – unexpected error

GET /user¶

Return the requester’s user information

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – UserProjected response

  • default – unexpected error

GET /users¶

Return a list of Users accessible to the requester

Query Parameters

  • username (string) – Matches against the username according to the username-match parameter

  • username-match (string) – How to match against the username parameter

  • elevate (boolean) – Elevate the user context for this request if user is permitted (canAdmin)

  • projection (array) – Additional properties to include in the response.

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – UserProjected array response

  • default – unexpected error

POST /users¶

Create a User

Query Parameters

  • elevate (boolean) – Elevate the user context for this request if user is permitted (canAdmin)

  • projection (array) – Additional properties to include in the response.

Status Codes

  • 201 Created – UserProjected response

  • default – unexpected error

  • projection (array) – Additional properties to include in the response.

  • 200 OK – UserProjected response

  • default – unexpected error
